name: PyClassInformer
description: Yet Another RTTI Parser - Binary Ninja port of the IDA PyClassInformer plugin for analyzing MSVC++ RTTI structures
longdescription:
PyClassInformer analyzes MSVC++ compiled binaries to extract Run-Time Type Information (RTTI) structures, including class hierarchies, virtual function tables, and method information. This is a Binary Ninja port of the popular IDA Pro plugin.

Features:
- Parse RTTI structures from PE files
- Extract class hierarchies and inheritance relationships
- Identify virtual function tables
- Classify methods by class
- Support for x86, x64, ARM, and ARM64 architectures

Supported platforms: Windows PE files compiled with MSVC++

license.name: Apache-2.0
license.text: Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0

installinstructions.Windows: Copy the entire plugin directory to your Binary Ninja plugins folder
installinstructions.Linux: Copy the entire plugin directory to your Binary Ninja plugins folder
installinstructions.Darwin: Copy the entire plugin directory to your Binary Ninja plugins folder

author: Binary Ninja Port
